summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FleetEase SuperAdmin and multi-tenant architecture. Backend SuperAdmin APIs are 95.5% functional with 21/22 tests passing. Frontend SuperAdmin panel is fully operational with complete company management workflow. Critical verification confirmed: Firma Admin panel correctly hides 'Firmalar' menu, ensuring proper role separation in multi-tenant architecture.

minor_issues.issue: Unauthenticated access returns 403 instead of expected 401
minor_issues.impact: Very low - still blocks access correctly
minor_issues.note: Functionally correct, just different HTTP status code

automation_issues.issue: Multiple elements with same data-testid causing selector ambiguity
automation_issues.note: Does not affect functionality, only test automation

passed_tests: Backend: SuperAdmin login with admin@fleetease.com credentials
Backend: SuperAdmin platform statistics API (/api/superadmin/stats)
Backend: Company creation with auto-admin user generation
Backend: Company listing and search functionality
Backend: Company details retrieval
Backend: Company status management (activate/suspend/delete)
Backend: Auto-created Firma Admin login functionality
Backend: Role-based access control (Firma Admin blocked from SuperAdmin endpoints)
Backend: Company deletion (soft delete) functionality
Backend: Error handling for invalid requests and duplicate data
Frontend: SuperAdmin login page (/superadmin/login) with proper styling
Frontend: SuperAdmin dashboard with platform statistics display
Frontend: SuperAdmin companies listing page with search functionality
Frontend: 4-step company creation wizard (Company Info → Domain Settings → Admin Account → Subscription)
Frontend: Company wizard form validation and auto-fill features
Frontend: Firma Admin login page accessibility
Frontend: Firma Admin dashboard functionality
Frontend: CRITICAL - 'Firmalar' menu correctly hidden in Firma Admin panel
Frontend: Firma Admin has access to expected menus (Dashboard, Araçlar, Müşteriler, Rezervasyonlar, GPS, Ödemeler, Raporlar, Tema Mağazası, Ayarlar)
Integration: SuperAdmin can create companies with automatic admin user creation
Integration: Role separation between SuperAdmin and Firma Admin panels working correctly

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All SuperAdmin and Firma Admin UI functionality working)
success_percentage.integration: 100% (Multi-tenant architecture and role separation working correctly)
